## IRouter.replace() method

替换当前路由

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
replace(urlOrLocation: Partial<Location>, target?: RouteTarget, payload?: any): void | Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  urlOrLocation | Partial&lt;[Location](./vue-taro.location.md)<!-- -->&gt; | 路由描述 |
|  target | [RouteTarget](./vue-taro.routetarget.md) | 指定要操作的路由栈，默认:<code>page</code> |
|  payload | any | 提交给 [RouteRuntime](./vue-taro.routeruntime.md) 的数据 |

<b>Returns:</b>

void \| Promise&lt;void&gt;
